snippet: The team of experts will review ways to provide security assistance, notably military training, to help Libya combat Islamist militants claiming allegiance to Al Qaeda and other threats.
abstract: NATO is sending team of experts to Libya to assess how alliance can provide security assistance, notably military training, to help nation combat Islamist militants claiming allegiance to Al Qaeda and other threats.
lead_paragraph: The team of experts will review ways to provide security assistance, notably military training, to help Libya combat Islamist militants claiming allegiance to Al Qaeda and other threats.

headline.seo: NATO to Send Team to Libya to Assess Security Aid
headline.main: NATO to Send Team to Libya to Assess Security Aid
headline.print_headline:
Belgium: NATO Sends Team to Libya
To Assess Providing Security Aid
